lenders.occupational_info: I am a Founder/Director of a community based organization in a small flood-prone village in western Kenya. We are running a school for orphans and poor children from the community and I need to raise money to buy books, uniforms, food  and to build classrooms. We have set up a community OVC care and support program for elderly caregivers and vulnerable families and we require funds to set up income generating activities to enable these people to be economically stable and self reliant. The poverty levels in this region are extremely high and the number of orphans continues to rise.

lenders.loan_because:
With Kiva, I help entrepreneurs start a business, nourish their family, or pay for emergencies.  All of this for no-to-low overhead cost. 

If we don't help those in impoverished areas, then the alternative is for them to rely on outrageous loans that burden them from successfully starting their business.  

For some background Information, here's a TED video:
http://www.ted.com/talks/jessica_jackley_poverty_money_and_love.html

lenders.occupational_info: I was a teacher of mathematics and science in our local high school for 35 years. I have four grown children and ten grandchildren. Now, other than time with family, I spend most of my time and effort to provide more public land and hiking trails for the public. The photo shows me on a hiking trail where I have been working with other volunteers above our town in the State of Maine in the USA.

lenders.occupational_info: I'm pursuing a PhD in computer science. That entails 5-6 years of research on a particular topic. In my case, I'm studying the application of artificial intelligence techniques to games. That may sound a little abstract or even downright callous, given the problems that the world faces, but I hope that the techniques that I'll be studying, including real-time planning techniques, can be applied to other domains fruitfully.

lenders.occupational_info: i work with others to build, manage and operate cancer treatment centers

lenders.name: Marlene
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference

lenders.name: arvind
lenders.loan_because: Makes me feel good that this small contribution can make a huge different to someone's life. Moreover, I appreciate the spirit of entrepreneurship in people I loan to.

lenders.name: Corinne & Dylan
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes when we are generous in even just the smallest way ,it can change someone else's life forever.

lenders.name: JITENDRA
lenders.loan_because: i purchased material for trading ,but shortage of money.
lenders.occupational_info: i am  a trader of iron &steel scrap.

lenders.name: Neal
lenders.loan_because: To help those in need, and i believe one can make a difference by giving. We need to all get involved to make this world a better place rather than wage war against one another.
lenders.occupational_info: im someone who helps even when there is not much money involved.

lenders.name: Benjamin
lenders.loan_because: I love Jesus.

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: a brother or sister somewhere in the world has a need that I can help fill.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with college students, helping them to be more aware of all that God has  gifted them with, so that they can share their lives with others, especially those most in need.

lenders.name: natacha
lenders.loan_because: I was given the opportunity to share wonderful times with people who had nothing but gave so much, and because I believe everyone can help this world become a better place
lenders.occupational_info: I make computer graphic special effects for movies, and also have my own line of children paintings and textiles.

lenders.name: Taryn
lenders.loan_because: it's good to help others when you have the chance, even if it's only a little bit.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I believe that loaning through Kiva is a great way to promote sustainable development throughout the world. It's empowering and allows the entrepreneurs to fulfill their dreams and achieve a better life for themselves which might not of been possible before.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a University student in Australia.

lenders.name: Gulzar
lenders.occupation: Pastor Church of the Holy Spirit Pak
lenders.loan_because: To help the Human Kind.
lenders.occupational_info: Enthusiastic to help others.

lenders.name: Shawn
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am just a guy making a living, just like the people I am lending to.

lenders.name: Doug & Karan
lenders.occupational_info: My work involves assessing Government welfare payments for Widows and Sick people

lenders.name: M. Farhanul
lenders.occupational_info: My goal  is to become a true social entrepreneur who would lead by example through setting high standards of doing a socially responsible business and making a positive difference in the society. I shall, through out my profitable but social endeavors, demonstrate that business is all about 3Ps- People, Planet and Profit. I shall reinvent the style of Management in the community. I shall also be engaged in teaching and consulting on business and environmental issues to create awareness among all concerned.

lenders.name: Benno
lenders.loan_because: It has a direct and lasting impact on individuals around the world who can really use it. For me that's much better than donating money to a large organisation and not knowing what's happening with the cash.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a company that manufactures and sells natural stone products to customers in Western Europe.

lenders.name: Jonas
lenders.loan_because: We're all part of one picture, one balance.
lenders.occupational_info: I conduct brass bands, and also teach brass instrument playing.

lenders.name: Chris Brown
lenders.loan_because: I run a company too, so I know how imporatnt having money to buy supplies is to getting the whole thing started.  Kiva is a great organization and it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies build awareness with the people who buy things from them so they can sell more of their products and services

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: Interested in business and emerging collaborative technologies...just came across Kiva this morning, testing the waters.  Would like to get classmates, school, and friends involved if things go well.
lenders.occupational_info: Working for a small start-up company focused on facilitating the foreign direct investment process

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I love the entrepreneurial spirit
lenders.occupational_info: I program digital mapping systems

lenders.name: Eloy
lenders.loan_because: It's a little way to share our luck.

lenders.name: Mark and Miles
lenders.occupational_info: I make and publish books - about all kinds of subjects - music, culture, the environment, travel and fiction - which are sold mainly in Britain. My son Miles is 14 and at school. He likes to play guitar.

lenders.name: martez
lenders.loan_because: i want to help more people become entrepreneurs and control their own future of success through business ownership
lenders.occupational_info: my work is very interesting.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to encourage and support people to run their own business.

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because: I started my first business at 18 and remember how hard it was to get financing.  Friends helped me, not the banks and because of their support I was successful.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired from business, I know work to improve the health care system so everyone has good healthcare.

lenders.name: Allen
lenders.loan_because: I am curious about the Kiva process.
lenders.occupational_info: Full time college student.
